--- select_singer_with_column_names.sql
SELECT
  SingerId AS ID,
  FirstName,
  LastName,
  SingerInfo,
  BirthDate
FROM Singers

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Alias{
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  9,
          end:  17,
          Name: "SingerId",
        },
        As: &parser.AsAlias{
          pos:   18,
          Alias: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  21,
            end:  23,
            Name: "ID",
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  27,
          end:  36,
          Name: "FirstName",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  40,
          end:  48,
          Name: "LastName",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  52,
          end:  62,
          Name: "SingerInfo",
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  66,
          end:  75,
          Name: "BirthDate",
        },
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   76,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      81,
            end:      88,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  81,
              end:  88,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint:       (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:         (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT SingerId AS ID, FirstName, LastName, SingerInfo, BirthDate FROM Singers
